RelatedSentence: Before congratulating him , PM and the AL government should learn the reason of the fall of the Congress -- it was massive corruption !

A0: Modi who with his fierce communal outlook got the landslide
RelatedSentence: Modi has received the mandate of the Indians .
And let 's hope : democracy is secularism , secularism democracy .
I believe nothing has changed in India .
It 's not BJP that won the election , rather it 's Modi who with his fierce communal outlook got the landslide .
